definitions.definition: A soft , low-pitched sound ; specifically, a soft or sentimental hum , song , or tune .
A continuous hollow low-pitched moan , as of cattle ; a bellow .
The low-pitched sound of a large bell .

main_definition: A soft , low-pitched sound ; specifically, a soft or sentimental hum , song , or tune .
secondary_definitions: ( Northern England , Scotland ) A continuous hollow low-pitched moan , as of cattle ; a bellow .
( Northern England , Scotland ) The low-pitched sound of a large bell .
